Title: Tarikh
Desc: Anirban, an idealist professor, and Ira, a conservative hospitality professional, are happily married. However, something unusually strong seems to pull Ira towards Anirban’s friend, Rudranshu. Tarikh explores various facets of human existence – life, death, morals, immortality, unrequited love, sacrifices – through the lives of these three characters with contrasting views of the world and life.

Title: Thammar Boyfriend
Desc: "Thammar Boyfriend" revolves around a wealthy but lonely woman, Nandini who decides to tie the knot again with a young and handsome bridegroom, Partho.

Title: The Parcel
Desc: What happens when you suddenly start receiving mysterious parcels containing seemingly ordinary gifts? 'The Parcel' is the story of Nandini and Souvik, whose blissful life gets stirred by parcels from an anonymous sender. Which dark secret threatens to unmask itself and turn everything upside down?

Title: Titas Ekti Nadir Naam
Desc: A Ritwik Ghatak film, "Titas Ekti Nadir Naam" is about a woman who’s saved by a fisherman from being sacrificed. But what’s in her fate?

Title: Titli
Desc: A teenager, Titli, who meets her favourite superstar, Rohit Roy, at an airport with her mother. But, her dreams get quickly shattered.

Title: Total Dadagiri
Desc: Joy falls in love with Jonaki, an MBA student, but is disliked by her father because of his failures as a student. Will he be able to convince her father ?

Title: Troyee
Desc: The classic tale of love triangle, "Troyee" is about three college students, Avik, Ranjan and Seema, who hang out together all the time but things get complicated when Avik and Ranjan fall in love with Seema.

Title: Tulkalam
Desc: The sudden boom in industrialisation threatens to take away the fertile lands from a village wherein honest, hard-working people work to make a living.

Title: Uttar Meleni
Desc: "Uttar Meleni" is about a modern woman’s life-long struggles. Does society view a self-reliant woman in a positive light?

Title: Uttarayan
Desc: "Uttarayan" is a classic tale of love within the war infested country. Can it triumph amidst the adversities of war?

Title: Vidyasagar
Desc: In a bid to eradicate social evils and propagate a progressive mindset, Ishwar Chandra Vidyasagar strives hard to educate the masses.

Title: Warrish
Desc: "Warrish" is about a man caught between his married life and his one-time fling with a former lover who is now dying.

Title: Yoddha (2014)
Desc: Rudra, a soldier in ancient times, dies while fighting for his one true love, Princess Durga and is reincarnated as Abir and resumes his search for his lover.

Title: Zulfiqar
Desc: An adaptation of two of William Shakespeare's tragedies: Julius Caesar and Antony and Cleopatra, Zulfiqar tells the story of opposing members of a powerful criminal organisation who fight with each other, ultimately leading to violence and bloodshed.
